A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I created a RT account just to post a bad review for this film. 

-Tone is completely off. The movie begins with Dameron making a prank call to Hux (seriously).

-Who is Rey? Who is Snoke? These are literally the biggest questions of TFA. We know less about Snoke from this film than TFA. Rey is a nobody.

-Luke Skywalker ends TFA staring\, terrified\, at Rey. This movie begins with him tossing Anakin's saber over his shoulder like he doesn't care\, and basically drinking blue milk from a teat.

-The "save the animals" scene at the casino is ridiculous.

-Why didn't the First Order send one ship ahead at light speed and turn around to blast the Resistance cruiser?

-Why did Luke not just meet Kylo in person if he was going to die anyway?

-Rey is a Jedi after failing one training session.

I could go on and on.
